channel.title: Ok... more stuff i need help with
channel.description:
ok, so heres more stuff that im not demaniding just asking to no how
ok so changing teleport postions, there was a tut but it got deleted and... how do i change somethings health...... and last but not least how do i make objects??

item.title: Ok... more stuff i need help with
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk

item.title: Ok... more stuff i need help with
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

[quote=“d shadow7 0, post:1, topic:88400”]ok, so heres more stuff that im not demaniding just asking to no how

ok so changing teleport postions, there was a tut but it got deleted
and… how do i change somethings health…
and last but not least how do i make objects??[/quote]
teleport position: search for this in your server client.java

[code]public void TeleTo(String s, int level)
{
teleX = absX;
teleY = absY;
newheightLevel = heightLevel;
checkwildy();
if(teleblock == false && actionTimer <= 7)
{
if (s == “train”)
{
teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;
}

if (s == “kqueen”)
{
teleX = 3487;
teleY = 9493;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;

}

if (s == “Lumby”)
{
teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;
}

if (s == “Camelot”)
{
teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;
}

if (s == “Ardougne”)
{
teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;

}

if (s == “Watchtower”)
{
teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;

}

if (s == “Trollheim”)
{
teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;
}

if (s == “Ape”)
{
teleX = 2761;
teleY = 2784;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;
}
if (s == “Paddewwa”){

teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
newheightLevel = 0;
}
if (s == “Senntisten”){

teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
newheightLevel = 0;
}
if (s == “Kharyrll”){

teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
newheightLevel = 0;
}
if (s == “Lasaar”){

teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
newheightLevel = 0;
}
if (s == “Carrallangar”){

teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
newheightLevel = 0;
}
if (s == “Annakarl”){

teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
newheightLevel = 0;
}
if (s == “Ghorrock”){

teleX = 2789;
teleY = 2780;
addSkillXP((0*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
newheightLevel = 0;
}
RemoveAllWindows();
closeInterface();
teleport();
actionTimer = 10;
}
else if(teleblock == true)
{
sendMessage(“you have been tbed. you can’t tele now”);
}
else if(playerLevel[6] < level)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of “+level+” to cast this spell.”);
}
else if(inwildy == true)
{
sendMessage(“You can’t tele in the wildy”);
}
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code] now just change the name, the coordsx and y and the hight lvl(if needed)
now search for this

//start of teles case 4140: TeleTo("train", 0); ancientstele = false; break;//varr case 4143: TeleTo("train", 0); ancientstele = false; break;//lumb case 4146: TeleTo("kqueen", 0); ancientstele = false; break;//fally case 4150: TeleTo("train", 0); ancientstele = false; break;//camy case 6004: TeleTo("train", 0);ancientstele = false; break;//ardy case 6005: TeleTo("train", 0);ancientstele = false; break;//mage guild case 29031: TeleTo("train", 0);ancientstele = false; break;//deathmountain case 72038: TeleTo("Ape", 0); ancientstele = false; break;//apeatoll case 50235: TeleTo("kqueen", 0); ancientstele = true; break;//padewa case 50245: TeleTo("train", 0); ancientstele = true; break;//1st ancient spell case 50253: TeleTo("train", 0); ancientstele = true; break;//2nd ancient spell case 51005: TeleTo("train", 0); ancientstele = true; break;//3th ancient spell case 51013: TeleTo("train", 0); ancientstele = true; break;//4th ancient spell case 51023: TeleTo("train", 0); ancientstele = true; break;//5th ancient spell case 51031: TeleTo("train", 0); ancientstele = true; break;//6th ancient spell case 51039: TeleTo("train", 0); ancientstele = true; break;//7th ancient spell //end of teles
change where it sais “train” at my example to the name of the spell you have just changed

for the health search for this

/*case 315: //Shrimps case 319: //Anchovies case 325: //Sardine case 329: //Salmon case 333: //Trout case 339: //Cod case 347: //Herring case 351: //Pike case 355: //Mackerel case 361: //Tuna case 365: //Bass case 373: //Swordfish case 379: //Lobster case 385: //Shark case 391: //Manta ray case 397: //Sea turtle case 4049: //Bandages case 534: //Baby Blue Dragon Bones case 536: //Dragon Bones case 526: //Bones case 528: //Burnt Bones case 2859: //Wolf Bones case 530: //Bat Bones case 532: //Big Bones case 3125: //Jogre Bones case 1885: //Ugthanki kebab case 2011: //Curry case 1891: //Cake case 1893: //2/3 cake case 1895: //Slice of cake case 1977: //Chocolatey milk case 2333: //Half a redberry pie case 1897: //Chocolate cake case 1899: //2/3 chocolate cake case 1901: //Chocolate slice case 1961: //Easter Egg case 2331: //Half a meat pie case 2309: //Bread case 1993: //Jug of wine case 2003: //Stew case 2303: //1/2pineapple pizza case 2149: //Lava eel case 2343: //Cooked oomlie wrap case 2289: //Plain pizza case 2291: //1/2 plain pizza case 2335: //Half an apple pie case 2293: //Meat pizza case 2295: //1/2 meat pizza case 2297: //Anchovy pizza case 2299: //1/2 anchovy pizza case 2301: //Pineapple pizza case 2323: //Apple pie case 3225: //Redberry pie case 2327: //Meat pie case 2878: //Cooked chompy case 3123: //Shaikahan Bones case 3144: //Cooked karambwan case 3146: //Cooked karambwan case 3179: //Monkey Bones case 3369: //Thin snail meat case 3371: //Lean snail meat case 3373: //Fat snail meat case 3381: //Cooked slimy eel case 4291: //Cooked chicken case 4293: //Cooked meat case 4242: //Cup of tea (nettle tea) case 4812: //Zogre Bones case 4830: //Fayrg Bones case 4832: //Raurg Bones case 4834: //Ourg Bones case 5003: //Cave eel case 5988: //Sweetcorn case 6297: //Spider on stick case 6299: //Spider on shaft */ case 1963: //banana healing[1] = 35; healing[2] = 35; healing[3] = -1; break;
again this is edited so it will be differant at your server
spawn objects: fedixer has made a tut about this ill give you the link if i find it

Read full topic

item.title: Ok... more stuff i need help with
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

  1. open up client hava and hit ctrl f
    find “falador” until you find a bunch of teles w\ coords
    edit the coords
  2. somethings health as in npc? open up npc.cfg, youll see a number (npc id) a name (npc name) a number (npc combat) and a number (npc health) only edit the last one, the others dont appear up and are messed up if you edit them
  3. refer to -fedexers- global objects tut

Read full topic
